title: Chocolate Cake
instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). 
2. In a mixing bowl, combine cocoa, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 
3. Add eggs, butter, vanilla extract, and milk to the dry ingredients. Mix until smooth. 
4. Pour the batter into a greased cake pan. 
5. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. 
6. Let the cake cool before serving. Enjoy!

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A quick and flavorful chicken stir-fry...
instructions:
1. Slice chicken breast and marinate with soy sauce, ginger, and cornstarch. 
2. Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. 
3. Add minced garlic and onion, stir-fry until fragrant. 
4. Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 
5. Add sliced broccoli, bell peppers, and carrots, stir-fry until vegetables are tender. 
6. Season with soy sauce and oyster sauce. 
7. Serve hot with rice or noodles. Enjoy!

title: Caprese Salad
description: A simple and refreshing salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil...
instructions:
1. Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese into thin slices. 
2. Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate, alternating with fresh basil leaves. 
3. Drizzle extra virgin olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad. 
4. Season with salt and black pepper to taste. 
5. Serve immediately as a side dish or appetizer. Enjoy!
